messages.subject: Take-OFF game rules
messages.msgSnippet: **I went thrift shopping yesterday and came home with Survive, Pirateer and TAKE-OFF.  In TAKE-OFF you have to fly a fleet of planes through a web of flight
messages.messageBody:
**I went thrift shopping yesterday and came home with Survive, Pirateer
and TAKE-OFF. In TAKE-OFF you have to fly a fleet of planes through a
web of flight paths connecting cities around the world. And we had to
make up the rules as the rules were missing, even though the little
packages of parts were unopened.**

You can download the rules in pdf format here, or order a paper copy

http://www.resourcegames.com/takeoff.htm

Betsy, did you read over the last Unschooling.com newsletter? There was much
discussion of math stuff in it, if you'd like a copy email me off list and
I'll send it to you.

:) Deborah in IL
